_xResult.title: Bora Linen Pants
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made long linen pants with wide-leg cut
_xResult.longdesc:
Stay cool and zen in these custom made wide-legged pants made of 100% pure, medium- weight linen.  They are available in 31 colors. Please choose from the color palette in last picture, and provide your color preference information during checkout.

 

Features include an elastic waistband, two side pockets, and a rise below your waistline.

 

Shantima uses Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees to you that it meets human - ecological requirements. The fabric has already been washed and softened and will shrink no more.

properties.propvalue: Gentle machine wash on low temperatures with soft washing agents. Machine drying in the most gentle way, please use cool temperatures. Avoid overdrying.Â No ironing required to maintain relaxed and wrinkled texture.
